DOC.brief_title: Study Itraconazole Patients With Advanced HIV Infection
DOC.detailed_description: Patients receive intravenous itraconazole solution twice daily 2 day daily five additional day . Patients randomized receive twice-daily once-daily itraconazole oral solution additional 28 day .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Concurrent Medication : Allowed : Antiretroviral therapy provide patient already stable , unchanged regimen 8 week prior study entry . Patients must : Documented HIV infection . CD4 lymphocyte count < 300 cells/mm3 . No clinically significant abnormality , elicit history physical examination . No clinically significant abnormality blood count , biochemical profile , urinalysis within 2 week study entry . Negative urine screening . No clinically significant abnormality electrocardiogram . Prior Medication : Allowed : Antiretroviral therapy provide patient stable , unchanged regimen 8 week prior study entry . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Acute opportunistic infection significant concurrent illness would preclude participation require 36 day . Unable swallow oral solution . Obesity great 25 % ideal body weight . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Rifampin . Rifabutin . Phenobarbital . Phenytoin . Carbamazepine . Digoxin . Warfarin . Midazolam . Triazolam . Terfenadine . Astemizole . Cisapride . H2 blocker . Omeprazole . Continual antacid . Didanosine . Any medication know affect absorption , metabolism excretion imidazole azole compound . Patients follow prior symptom condition exclude : Previous hypersensitivity azole antifungal . History surgical procedure may interfere absorption itraconazole . History significant blood loss previous 30 day . Prior Medication : Excluded : Excluded within 15 day prior study entry : Rifampin . Rifabutin . Phenobarbital . Phenytoin . Carbamazepine . Digoxin . Warfarin . Midazolam . Triazolam . Excluded within 8 week prior study entry : Change antiretroviral therapy . Risk Behavior : Excluded : Patients chew tobacco regularly smoke 10 cigarette per day .
